root.message: The SDG_RELATED_INDICATORS field for indicator 9-5-1, translated into en
root.data:
Linkages with goals and targets: 2a, 3b, 12a, 14a, 17.6, 17.7

Linkages with indicators: 3.b.2 Total net official development assistance to medical research and basic health sectors; 14.a.1 Proportion of total research budget allocated to research in the field of marine technology
